member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob
member.summary: Represents a batch job created to run against a machine learning endpoint

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of BatchJob with the specified job identifier
member.param: The unique identifier for this batch job.
Reference to the service client assigned to the endpoint the job was registered against.
Logger instance for tracing functionality behavior.
member.exception: jobId is not specified.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob.Start
member.summary: Schedule a registered job to run on the Azure Machine Learning platform
member.exception: If any error is reported back from the service on the API call.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob.CheckStatus
member.summary: Checks the current status of a batch job
member.returns: The current status of the job.
member.exception: If any error is reported back from the service on the API call.
If the service response payload fails to deserialize in the expected format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob.WaitForCompletion
member.summary: Monitor a running batch job until its completion
member.returns: The job's status upon its completion.
member.remarks: A job is considered completed when it reaches any of its possible final states: Finished, Failed or Cancelled.
member.exception: If any error is reported back from the service on the API call.
If the service response payload fails to deserialize in the expected format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob.Cancel

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.BatchJob.WaitForCompletionAsync(System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously monitor a running batch job until its completion or until the provided timeout interval has expired
member.param: The time interval between consequtive job status polls.
The maximum time duration to keep polling for the job status.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: Returns a Task which will yield the job's status upon its completion.
member.remarks: A job is considered completed when it reaches any of its possible final states: Finished, Failed or Cancelled.
member.exception: pollingInterval or timeoutInterval are not finite time periods.
If any error is reported back from the service on the API call.
If the service response payload fails to deserialize in the expected format.
The operation's duration exceeded the passed in timeoutInterval.
If a task cancellation is detected.

member.summary: The job has been explicitly cancelled by the user

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.MachineLearning.Contracts.JobState.Finished
member.summary: The job has completed running successfully

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to parse the service response for {0} api call. Actual error message: {1}. Please contact the Azure Machine Learning forum about this issue and provide the request id and timestamp of the request as logged by the SDK - https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/en-US/home?forum=MachineLearning.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No value has been specified for expected argument..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The format of the blob reference returned by the service api call is invalid. Please contact the Azure Machine Learning forum about this issue and provide the request id and timestamp of the request as logged by the SDK - https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/azure/en-US/home?forum=MachineLearning.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An integer value > 0 is expected for this parameter..

A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

If a task cancellation is detected.
